response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item is not just any commodity; it's a testament to our dedication to excellence and innovation. We believe its value transcends its monetary worth, making it an invaluable asset for those who appreciate quality and craftsmanship. Considering its unique features and benefits, we're offering this masterpiece to you at an exclusive price of $20,000. We're confident that once you experience its capabilities and understand its significance, you'll agree that this investment is well worth the cost. Let's make this extraordinary opportunity yours today.", "product_price": 20000}
